name: V A P E O V E R
name_original: V A P E O V E R
description:
Hey welcome to my super busted thing! You can stand on top of a building and maybe pick up these l'il chiclet looking vape components and attach them to your Sick Vape Rig. That's about it!

Does it matter which ones? No!
Is there a win condition? No!
Does it vape harder if I add more components? No!

G A M E J A M S

( WASD to move, left-click to pick things up. )

Created by Andrew Ferguson | @warandpeace

Models: Simple Poly City by VenCreations

Music: Starry Winters by Ghostface Killah ft. Killah Priest (Used Without Permission)
